data.text:
Tripti Joshi

(Editor)

I am a Teacher who started creating online content for my students from 2016 so that they can get access to free knowledge online.

Konstanty Zamoyski

Share on FacebookTweet on TwitterShare on LinkedInShare on Reddit

Sign in

Konstanty Zamoyski (1799–1866) was a Polish nobleman (szlachcic).

Konstanty became the 13th Ordynat of Zamość estate and was Chamberlain on the royal court in Russia. He married Princess Aniela Sapieha on April 19, 1827. He passed the law of antiquity in Poland. The law was repealed soon after his death.
